name: Ocean Man (itch)
description:
Ocean Man is a short and very challenging game about avoiding sea life while exploring the depths of the ocean. The ocean is a hostile, dangerous place which will not hesitate to obliterate you in a second -- What I mean by this, is that Ocean Man is probably the most realistic ocean game ever made. Step aside Abzu.

- Buy & Stream the Soundtrack Here! -
